name: Cockroach Simulator (itch)
description:
This game is about the hard life in the kitchen. In this unusual place many interests intertwine.
But the only war between humans and cockroaches is truly epic and destructive.
You can choose any of the sides and try your hand.
- Multiplayer up to 10 players
- Many different weapons for confrontation against cockroaches                                                 -Shoot cockroaches with a shotgun                                                                                                                 -Become a fucking fly even though this game is called cockroach simulator not fly simulator

How to play:

MAN: The goal for MAN is to kill all the cockroaches! Use objects in the kitchen like knifes,pots,shotgun,and more!

Cockroaches: Cockroaches have to eat bread crumbs if u find it go next to it! Eat 5 breadcrumbs to make a egg! Make 4 eggs to win! Remember Ur team share lives so try not to die! U can also climb on walls!
